oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Department of Energy Photograph Collection
V-J Day celebration at Batavia Hall
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A group of smiling women are standing outdoors on the steps of a building. One woman holds a washboard; other women hold buckets.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Batavia Hall; Dormitories; Victory celebrations
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: See Oak Ridge Journal of August 23, 1945 for a similar image.
